name: Beaming
description: When @{item}{Rescue} or @{item}{Warp} is used, create a @{tile}{Wormhole} in tile where targeted unit was teleported from. The next unit that enters this tile is teleported to the targetâ€™s location and the wormhole disappears. If the tile is occupied it teleports to an adjacent tile of its choice instead.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
